mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book (title, author_id, category_id, published_year) VALUES (#{title}, #{authorId}, #{categoryId}, #{publishedYear})
mapper.update:
UPDATE book
title = #{title},
author_id = #{authorId},
category_id = #{categoryId},
published_year = #{publishedYear},
WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT b.id AS id, b.title AS title, a.name AS author, c.name AS category, b.published_year AS publishedYear FROM book b JOIN author a ON b.author_id = a.id JOIN category c ON b.category_id = c.id

SELECT b.id AS id, b.title AS title, a.name AS author, c.name AS category, b.published_year AS publishedYear FROM book b JOIN author a ON b.author_id = a.id JOIN category c ON b.category_id = c.id WHERE b.id = #{id}

SELECT b.id AS id, b.title AS title, a.name AS author, -- 获取作者名称 c.name AS category, -- 获取分类名称 b.published_year AS publishedYear FROM book b LEFT JOIN author a ON b.author_id = a.id LEFT JOIN category c ON b.category_id = c.id WHERE b.category_id = #{categoryId};

SELECT b.id, b.title, b.author_id AS authorId, a.name AS author, -- 获取作者姓名 b.category_id AS categoryId, c.name AS category, -- 获取分类名称 b.published_year AS publishedYear FROM book b LEFT JOIN author a ON b.author_id = a.id -- 连接查询作者表 LEFT JOIN category c ON b.category_id = c.id -- 连接查询分类表 WHERE b.author_id = #{authorId};
